802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Default settings in this entry are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3077986 FCC label]. *[http://routerchart.com/zyxel/zyxel-ac1300-nbg6617-nbg6617-116 ''ZyXEL AC1300 NBG6617 (2016)'' on '''RouterChart'''] :CPU: Quad-Core @600MHz, 256MB RAM, 16MB Flash :WLAN: AC1300 802.11abgn/ac (400+867 Mbps) ===Specifications=== *CPU: 600MHz Quad-Core Processor, RAM: 256MB, FLA: 32MB *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 400 Mbps for 2.4GHz, 867 Mbps for 5GHz *WLAN Features: Wave2, MU-MIMO, Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Antenna: 2x 7dBi external antennas (RP-SMA) *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 4x LAN GbE, 1x USB 3.0 *USB Support: Mass storage support by SMB/CIFS/FTP, Print server *Application Control: Parental control, ONE Connect, ZyXEL Photo *System Management: Online firmware upgrade, Wake on LAN, UPnP *Media Server: DLNA, WiFi Multimedia (WMM), SMB *Operation Mode: Router mode, Access point mode *Power: 12V DC, 2A; Power consumption: 20W ==Links of Interest== ===Firmware=== *{{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6617}}, {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6617}} *[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX ''LEDE/Openwrt for IPQ4019/IPQ4028 devices'' on '''chunkeey'''] :[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX/commit/229c42a91ce6661bc81f036930dde1801f959026 ipq40xx: add support for the ZyXEL NBG6617] 
SOC:    Qualcomm IPQ4018 @710MHz (QCA Dakota) WiSoC
CPU:    Quad-Core ARMv7 Cortex-A7 rev 5 (v7l) Processor
FLASH:  Macronix MX25L25635F 32MiB (NOR)
RAM:    Nanya NT5CC128M16IP-DI 256MiB (DDR3L-1600/1866 @537MHz)
ETH:    Qualcomm Atheros QCA8075 Gigabit Switch (4x LAN, 1x WAN)
USB:    1x 3.0 (via Synopsys DesignWare DWC3 controller in SoC)
WLAN1:  Qualcomm IPQ4018 2.4GHz 802.11bgn 2:2x2
WLAN2:  Qualcomm IPQ4018 5GHz 802.11an/ac 2:2x2
INPUT:  RESET Button, WiFi On/Off Button, WPS Button
LEDS:   Power, WAN, LAN 1-4, WLAN 2.4GHz, WLAN 5GHz, USB, WPS

Serial:
WARNING: The serial port needs a TTL/RS-232 3.3v level converter!
Serial setting is 115200-8-N-1. 1x4 .1" header comes pre-soldered.
Pinout: [1] +3.3V (label printed on PCB), (2) Rx, (3) GND, (4) Tx
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6617 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6617 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX/commit/229c42a91ce6661bc81f036930dde1801f959026 |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = See the device page for VLAN tagging }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
